review: I bought the Fire TV Stick  so I could access Netflix and Amazon Instant Video when I was traveling. The device takes up very little room in a suitcase. Installation on a TV that has a USB port is very easy, and accessing a broadband network through the on-screen menu is pretty straightforward. I found that the Fire TV Stick's performance is excellent, but, of course, it's performance will depend a lot on how good the broadband is. I am very satisfied with this device and would recommend it. I should mention that you may not be able to access Netflix or Amazon Instant Video if you are out of the country. Recently, on a trip to St. Kitts, I was unable to access Amazon Instant Video, but I did get Netflix. That limitation was due to video viewing rights and not a lack of functionality of the Fire TV Stick.
